arrayOfProducts.name: Wireless Headphones
arrayOfProducts.description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise-cancellation and a 20-hour battery life.

arrayOfProducts.description: A sleek smart watch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and customizable watch faces.

arrayOfProducts.description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with rich bass and a 12-hour battery life.

arrayOfProducts.name: Laptop Stand
arrayOfProducts.description: Adjustable laptop stand for improved posture and airflow to your device.

arrayOfProducts.name: Wireless Mouse

arrayOfProducts.name: Mechanical Keyboard
